timeline.message: [FAI-58] Add tests for DMN context implementations and required fixes
[FAI-58] Add tests for DMN context implementations and required fixes

timeline.bodyText: this method is redundant, so better to drop it from the interface "less is more".
timeline.author: tarilabs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
+package org.kie.dmn.api.core;
+
+import java.util.Map;
+
+public interface DMNMetadata {
+
+    /**
+     * Sets or changes the value of an attribute
+     *
+     * @param name the attribute name
+     * @param value the attribute value
+     * @return the previous value associated with the name if present, null otherwise
+     */
+    Object set(String name, Object value);
+
+    /**
+     * Returns an attribute associated with this meta data by name.
+     *
+     * @param name the attribute name
+     * @return the attribute object
+     */
+    Object get(String name);
+
+    /**
+     * @return a read-only list of attributes.
+     */
+    Map<String, Object> getAll();
+
+    /**
+     * Tells if an attribute with the specified name is defined or not
+     *
+     * @param name the attribute name
+     * @return true if the attribute exists, false otherwise
+     */
+    boolean isDefined(String name);

timeline.bodyText: please rename as asMap or something like that, to avoid the problem of automatic triggering of Jackson
timeline.author: tarilabs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
+package org.kie.dmn.api.core;
+
+import java.util.Map;
+
+public interface DMNMetadata {
+
+    /**
+     * Sets or changes the value of an attribute
+     *
+     * @param name the attribute name
+     * @param value the attribute value
+     * @return the previous value associated with the name if present, null otherwise
+     */
+    Object set(String name, Object value);
+
+    /**
+     * Returns an attribute associated with this meta data by name.
+     *
+     * @param name the attribute name
+     * @return the attribute object
+     */
+    Object get(String name);
+
+    /**
+     * @return a read-only list of attributes.
+     */
+    Map<String, Object> getAll();

timeline.message: [FAI-58] Avoid anonymous classes in DMNContext tests

timeline.bodyText: You should add a license really.
timeline.author: manstis

replies.bodyText: Whops! Sorry I will do it immediately! Thanks @manstis
